Title: Moon Knight Review
Author: Rotten Tomatoes
Content: Its entertainment value may wax and wane a bit, but Moon Knight ultimately settles into a mostly enjoyable -- and refreshingly weird -- spot in the MCU firmament.

Title: Morbius Review
Author: Rotten Tomatoes
Content: Cursed with uninspired effects, rote performances, and a borderline nonsensical story, this dreary mess is a vein attempt to make Morbius happen.

Title: Apex Legends Review
Author: IGN
Content: GOOD! with 7.5 rating, Jimmy and Kim's relationship takes a new turn. Mike decides it's for the best to sever his affiliation with an unrestrained associate.

Title: Apex Legends' New Legends
Author: Dexerto
Content: There are now a total of 20 Legends to play in Apex – 12 more than the game released with. But Respawn isn’t stopping there, and there are plans for many more Legends to come with each new season.

Title: My Own Article
Author: Naufal Firoos Asy Syarif
Content: Hi there! This is the first ever dummy article that I've made using markdown.
